thread.title: Noah
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Noah

author: Noah
title: Noah
text: I ordered the volcano thinking I really wanted it but when I realized I didn't have the total funds for it I asked for a refund and they sent me my money back within 24 hours. I then purchased a cheaper portable vape and got it within 3 days. I can honestly say I would love to see more wax pens on the site but other than that, this site is so damn good!
